# neon Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "neon" {
  api_key = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String) Neon API key. This can be generated at https://console.neon.tech/app/settings/account
